Closing Verified Change Requests

To close Verified change requests for a specific folder, you must first click the Change Requests tab and select the folder from the left pane.

To find all change requests in the folder, select the All Descendants button on the toolbar. Then create a filter or query or simply sort the Status column in the upper pane to find all Verified change requests.

To close a change request:

  1. Double-click the change request. The Change Request Properties dialog opens.

  2. Change the status to Closed. The application has the following verified statuses:

    • Closed (As Designed)

    • Closed (Cannot Reproduce)

    • Closed (Deferred)

    • Closed (Documented)

    • Closed (Fixed)

    • Closed (Is Duplicate)

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Click Apply, then click the Next or Previous button to review another change request.

    • Click OK to close the dialog.
